content:
The opening statement says

Unless you choose to enter your email, your answers will be anonymous.

However there doesn't seem to be a field for email this year? Should we update this statement? Or should we add field to collect email?

Xidorn Quan said:

The opening statement says

Unless you choose to enter your email, your answers will be anonymous.

However there doesn't seem to be a field for email this year? Should we update this statement? Or should we add field to collect email?

Yes that should have been caught - I'll make an issue
Do you want me to go ahead and remove the mention of email from the opening?
You can, but there's more that needs to be done to that text so I was going to take care of it all at once
I pushed some changes to the text on GitHub and I changed the English version on SurveyHero
Unfortunately, it doesn't look like the translation tool keeps track of updated text so there's no indication that the translators need to take another look at that text. That's a shame

We'll have to keep track of this, and make sure all the translators go through the survey again before we publish to double check their translations (paying special attention to what we know has changed since translations started)
I've removed the mention from the German translation.
I've updated the pt-br translation as well
I updated the Korean translation based on the new sentences.
